data.title: Double degree Business + Economics
data.meta_description: The double degree in Business Management + Economics and Management provides the knowledge for business management at an international level.
data.text:
1. Employability

95.8% of our students find employment at the end of their studies (AQU 2023 labour market insertion survey).

2. Leadership and Employability: Design YOUR Future

New Design YOUR Future Employability Acceleration Program for students of all Bachelor's Degrees at CEU universities, aiming to improve employability and facilitate integration into the professional world by reducing the time from the first work experience. Developed by the Employability Commission of the CEU Employability Advisory Council and designed by future employers, it focuses on understanding the labour market and how companies work.

3. Experience

Abat Oliba CEU University has been teaching Business Administration and Management for more than three decades. Our degree in Business Management offers students excellent professional prospects, as it allows them to learn about the various activities carried out in the field of business and companies.

In today's globalised world, people with initiative, knowledge, teamwork skills, ability to deal with others and knowledge of the different social, economic and political environments in which they will carry out their business activities are needed. The UAO CEU trains students to be able to successfully assume managerial tasks in the business world.

4. Double degree programme

Abat Oliba CEU University has been teaching Business Administration and Management for more than three decades. This double degree provides a comprehensive and in-depth vision of the business structure, which is highly valued in today's job market. It combines business, legal and economic issues. It also provides the necessary knowledge for the analysis and investigation of the factors involved in economic processes, using mathematical, statistical and sociological techniques.

Students will acquire skills in the areas of commerce, accounting, finance, taxation, economics, logistics and marketing, all in an international environment. The curriculum of this double degree is structured around four main pillars: quality academic training, development of personal and collective skills, internationalisation of the curriculum and professional work placements and entrepreneurship.

This double degree trains future professionals in the field of business organisation, management and administration, emphasising key aspects that must be taken into account when making decisions in companies working in global markets. Abat Oliba CEU University is a pioneer in the methodology that allows students to obtain two official degrees in five years.

5. Digital Business Management

New proprietary programme in Business Management and Marketing and Commercial Management to enable students to master the applications of big data in the business world and lead digital marketing strategies.

6. International Programmes

- International Business Certificate Program CEU - Boston University: students have the opportunity to take this programme at the Metropolitan College of Boston University in which they receive international training linked to their official Business Management degree studies.

- International Dual Degree Program Augsburg University: students also have the chance to obtain a double degree along with the Bachelor in International Management from the Augsburg University of Applied Sciences.

- University of California Riverside

programmes: UAO CEU students will have the option to take subjects of their choice from a wide range of options in the business and communication fields and earn a certificate from UCR. The credits obtained will also be recognised by UAO CEU.

Trimester Programme: Postgraduate Certificate in Management*

Six-month programme: Postgraduate Certificate in Applied Management*

Nine-month program: postgraduate Certificate in Applied Management*: includes specialisation diploma in Big Data, Digital Marketing, Human Resources, Event Management, International Business, project management, among other disciplines. Possibility of professional work placements and subsequent employment in the United States.

*Special terms for UAO CEU students

7. Learning by doing

New teaching methodology combining learning by doing and flipped classroom methodologies. The student becomes the center of the teaching model and the classroom generates professional experiences.

Business in Catalonia Forum: meeting and forum for debate around the business sector in Catalonia.

University Stock Exchange Conference: organised jointly with the Barcelona Stock Exchange.

BCN Thinking Challenge: Interuniversity hackathon organised by the Entrepreneurs’ Club.

Bloomberg platform: integrated platform used by financial and economic professionals.

8. Aula Emprende Programme

UAO CEU is committed to fostering the entrepreneurial spirit in all studies in the field of Business, through numerous initiatives, including:

Women Entrepreneurs Workshop

Events connecting family business and entrepreneurship

Experience-based Entrepreneurship Conferences

CEU Emprende Summer Camp

9. Work & Talent Area

We enhance careers through a system of work placements and job offers that aim to meet the needs of companies while promoting the best in each of our students.

• Professional Careers Guidance

• Work Placement and Employment Service

• Entrepreneurship Area

• Innovation Area

• Company Relations

10. Progressive International Development

New international experience that encourages students to internationalise their studies, from the first year to the fourth.

1st year: Students will be able to experience online interaction and research with universities in Germany and the United Kingdom.

2nd year: This first international experience consists of a short trip to one of our partner universities in Europe, and we also set up opportunities for interaction with events such as the BCN Thinking Challenge.

3rd year: We prepare students for cross-cultural economic challenges in collaboration with European universities.

4th year: We broaden horizons through the Erasmus programme, along with semester-long placements at one of our partner universities in Europe and America (New York, Boston, Toronto, Santiago, Dublin, Mexico City, Florida, etc.).

11. Research

Chairs and Research Groups:

- Chair of Solidarity Economy

- Chair of Family Business and Business Creation

- Research Group on Employability, Young People and Social Exclusion (EJES)

- Research Group on Entrepreneurship, Strategy and Entrepreneurial Competitiveness (GREECE)

Certificate in Data Journalism and Social Media

The Undergraduate Degree in Journalism includes the Certificate in Data Journalism and Social Media (24 ECTS on-site). Big data represents a major disruptive revolution in journalism. At the same time, social media have become new channels for communication with audiences.

This certificate offers students the chance to acquire the skills they need to be a part of this new data journalism and to play an active part in the latest communication trends.

Journalism Lab: Comprehensive Writing*

Social Media and Community Management

SECOND YEAR

Data Journalism

Data Strategy in Media

Technological Innovations in Journalism**

Newsroom Dynamics**
